mapper.select: SELECT t.uuid, t.name, t.path, t.size, t.md5, t.status, t.suffix, t.create_time, t.update_time FROM tbl_file t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_file( uuid, name, path, size, md5, status, suffix, create_time )VALUES( #{uuid}, #{name}, #{path}, #{size}, #{md5}, #{status}, #{suffix}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_file t SET t.uuid=#{uuid}, t.name=#{name}, t.path=#{path}, t.size=#{size}, t.md5=#{md5}, t.status=#{status}, t.suffix=#{suffix}, t.update_time=#{updateTime} WHERE t.uuid=#{uuid}
